breeds.name: Abyssinian
breeds.description: Short-haired, elegant and playful breed with an inquisitive nature.

breeds.name: American Bobtail
breeds.description: Medium to long-haired breed with a wild look, intelligent and affectionate.

breeds.name: American Curl
breeds.description: Distinctive curled ears, sociable and playful.

breeds.name: American Shorthair
breeds.description: Short-haired breed with a strong build, gentle and easy-going.

breeds.name: American Wirehair
breeds.description: Unique wiry coat, playful and adaptable.

breeds.name: Balinese
breeds.description: Long-haired Siamese variety, graceful and vocal.

breeds.name: Bengal
breeds.description: Short-haired, exotic and athletic with a leopard-like appearance.

breeds.name: Birman
breeds.description: Semi-long-haired breed with white gloves, affectionate and friendly.

breeds.name: Bombay
breeds.description: Short-haired breed with a sleek black coat, social and playful.

breeds.name: British Longhair
breeds.description: Plush long-haired coat, calm and independent.

breeds.name: British Shorthair
breeds.description: Short-haired with a dense coat, loyal and easygoing.

breeds.name: Burmese
breeds.description: Short-haired with a glossy coat, friendly and people-oriented.
